bib.title: plWordNet in Word Sense Disambiguation task
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and K{\k{e}}dzia, Pawe{\l} and Orli{\'n}ska, Marlena
bib.abstract: The paper explores the application of plWordNet, a very large wordnet of Polish, in weakly supervised Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD). Because plWordNet provides only partial descriptions by glosses and usage examples, and does not include sense-disambiguated
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 8th Global WordNet Conference (GWC)
